body.raw:
{
  "title": "如何优化文章数据库结构",
  "body": "本文介绍了如何优化博客和短文的数据库结构，以提升查询效率。",
  "content": "在设计文章数据库时，我们需要考虑存储结构、索引优化以及查询性能......",
  "coverUrl": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
  "category": ["数据库", "优化", "开发"],
  "published": true,
  "commented": false,
  "metaTitle": "优化文章数据库结构 | 技术博客",
  "metaDescription": "本篇文章详细讲解如何优化博客和短文的数据存储，提高查询速度和可扩展性。",
    "scope": "KtTLuJQbpe3ixKfLq"
}

{
    "source": "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn2:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn2="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:camunda="http://camunda.org/schema/1.0/bpmn" xmlns:zeebe="http://camunda.org/schema/zeebe/1.0" id="sample-diagram" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="bpmn-js-token-simulation" exporterVersion="0.37.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn2:process id="Process_1" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn2:startEvent id="StartEvent_1">
      <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_1xgrhj5</bpmn2:outgoing>
    </bpmn2:startEvent>
    <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1xgrhj5" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="Activity_1ne0crl" />
    <bpmn2:endEvent id="Event_14cc0d4">
      <bpmn2:extensionElements>
        <camunda:inputOutput />
      </bpmn2:extensionElements>
      <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_01rzb02</bpmn2:incoming>
    </bpmn2:endEvent>
    <bpmn2:sequenceFlow id="Flow_01rzb02" sourceRef="Activity_1ne0crl" targetRef="Event_14cc0d4" />
    <bpmn2:serviceTask id="Activity_1ne0crl" camunda:expression="${environment.services.rest}" camunda:resultVariable="result">
      <bpmn2:extensionElements>
        <camunda:inputOutput>
          <camunda:inputParameter name="label">你好</camunda:inputParameter>
          <camunda:inputParameter name="body">ab</camunda:inputParameter>
          <camunda:outputParameter name="out">out</camunda:outputParameter>
        </camunda:inputOutput>
        <camunda:properties>
          <camunda:property />
        </camunda:properties>
      </bpmn2:extensionElements>
      <bpmn2:incoming>Flow_1xgrhj5</bpmn2:incoming>
      <bpmn2:outgoing>Flow_01rzb02</bpmn2:outgoing>
    </bpmn2:serviceTask>
  </bpmn2:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_1" bpmnElement="Process_1">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2" bpmnElement="StartEvent_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="272" y="262" width="36" height="36" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Event_14cc0d4_di" bpmnElement="Event_14cc0d4">
        <dc:Bounds x="632" y="262" width="36" height="36" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Activity_19rmfls_di" bpmnElement="Activity_1ne0crl">
        <dc:Bounds x="370" y="240" width="100" height="80" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_1xgrhj5_di" bpmnElement="Flow_1xgrhj5">
        <di:waypoint x="308" y="280" />
        <di:waypoint x="370" y="280" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_01rzb02_di" bpmnElement="Flow_01rzb02">
        <di:waypoint x="470" y="280" />
        <di:waypoint x="632" y="280" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn2:definitions>
",
    "variables": {}
}
